Module fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp
Package fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp

Interface iAPICustom

All Known Implementing Classes:
WeatherDataFetcher
public interface iAPICustom
Interface for extracting data from the OpenWeatherMap API.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getCurrentWeather(double lat, double lon, String unit)
    Returns the current weather for the given coordinates.
    String
    getDailyForecast(double lat, double lon, String unit)
    Returns a daily forecast for the given coordinates.
    String
    getHourlyForecast(double lat, double lon, String unit)
    Returns a hourly forecast for the given coordinates.
    String
    lookUpLocation(String loc)
    Returns coordinates for a location.

  • Method Details

    • lookUpLocation

      String lookUpLocation(String loc)
      Returns coordinates for a location.
      Parameters:
      loc - Name of the location for which coordinates should be fetched.
      Returns:
      String.

    • getCurrentWeather

      String getCurrentWeather(double lat, double lon, String unit)
      Returns the current weather for the given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      lat - The latitude of the location.
      lon - The longitude of the location.
      unit - The unit for the temperature (metric/imperial).
      Returns:
      String.

    • getDailyForecast

      String getDailyForecast(double lat, double lon, String unit)
      Returns a daily forecast for the given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      lat - The latitude of the location.
      lon - The longitude of the location.
      unit - The unit for the temperature (metric/imperial).
      Returns:
      String.

    • getHourlyForecast

      String getHourlyForecast(double lat, double lon, String unit)
      Returns a hourly forecast for the given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      lat - The latitude of the location.
      lon - The longitude of the location.
      unit - The unit for the temperature (metric/imperial).
      Returns:
      String.
